title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-7.2 - Eligible projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 369-7.2 - Eligible projects

State Regulations

Eligible projects include municipal landfill gas
management system costs if the landfill gas management system meets the
following requirements: (a) the site
is municipally owned and the municipality is responsible for the continued
operation and maintenance of the landfill gas management system for its useful
life; and
(b) the active landfill
gas collection and treatment system is in compliance with the design
requirements of Part 208 of this Title, if applicable, has been approved by the
department, conforms to the requirements set forth in Part 363 of this Title, and is designed to maximize the capture of air emissions from the
landfill. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
369-7.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
